info.title: F5 Distributed Cloud Services API for VES.I/O.schema.ai_assistant.
info.description: Custom handler for ai assistant related microservice.

post.description: Temporarily to be used in place of AIAssistantQuery for evaluating API access/RBAC check.

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized.

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource.

404.description: Returned when resource is not found.

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value.

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently.

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API.

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily.

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request.

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description:
Namespace

x-example: "system"
Namespace of the HTTP Load Balancer for current request.

ai_assistantNegativeFeedbackType.description:
X-displayName "Negative Feedback Type"
Type of Negative Feedback

 - OTHER: x-displayName "Other"
Other
 - INACCURATE_DATA: x-displayName "Inaccurate data"
Inaccurate data
 - IRRELEVANT_CONTENT: x-displayName "Irrelevant content"
Irrelevant content
 - POOR_FORMAT: x-displayName "Poor format"
Poor format
 - SLOW_RESPONSE: x-displayName "Slow response"
Slow response.
ai_assistantNegativeFeedbackType.title: Negative Feedback Type.

ai_assistantcommonUnitType.description:
Unit Type defines the unit for each fields.

 - UNIT_TYPE_NONE: None

None type
 - GB: GB

 - PERCENT: Percent

 - BYTE: Byte.
ai_assistantcommonUnitType.title: UnitType

ai_assistantexplain_log_recordAction.description:
Action taken for the request

 - ACTION_NONE: None

No action
 - ALLOW: Allow

The request was allowed to pass
 - BLOCK: Block

The request was blocked
 - REDIRECT: Redirect

The request was redirected.
ai_assistantexplain_log_recordAction.title: Action

commonColourType.description:
Colour Type defines the colour of fields to be displayed.

 - COLOUR_TYPE_NONE: None

No colour
 - DANGER: danger

colour type red
 - INFO: info

colour type blue
 - WARNING: warning

colour type orange
 - AMBER: amber

colour type yellow
 - SUCCESS: success

colour type green
 - MALIBU: malibu

colour type blue.
commonColourType.title: ColourType.

commonColumnType.description:
Column Type defines the data type for each column.

 - COLUMN_TYPE_NONE: None

 - STRING: string

 - INT: integer

 - FLOAT: float

 - BOOL: boolean.

commonDashboardLinkType.description:
Link Type to be presented

 - SECURITY_ANALYTICS_EVENTS: SECURITY_ANALYTICS_EVENTS

Security analytics dashboard: /web/workspaces/web-app-and-API-protection/../dashboard/security-dashboard/../security_analytics/events
 - REQUESTS_EVENTS: REQUESTS_EVENTS

Requests dashboard: /web/workspaces/web-app-and-API-protection/../dashboard/security-dashboard/../security_monitoring/request
 - SITES: SITES

Sites dashboard: /web/workspaces/multi-cloud-network-connect/overview/sites/dashboard
 - CLOUD_CREDENTIALS: CLOUD_CREDENTIALS

CLOUD_CREDENTIALS --> /web/workspaces/multi-cloud-network-connect/manage/site_management/cloud_sites/cloud_credential
 - SITES_UBER: SITES_UBER

Sites dashboard: /web/workspaces/multi-cloud-network-connect/overview/sites/dashboard
 - SITE_ALERTS: SITE_ALERTS

Alerts dashboard: /web/workspaces/multi-cloud-network-connect/overview/infrastructure/sites/alerts
 - SITE_MANAGEMENT_AWS_VPC_SITES: SITE_MANAGEMENT_AWS_VPC_SITES

Site Management dashboard: /web/workspaces/multi-cloud-network-connect/manage/site_management/cloud_sites/aws_vpc_site
 - SITE_MANAGEMENT_AWS_TGW_SITES: SITE_MANAGEMENT_AWS_TGW_SITES

Site Management dashboard: /web/workspacesmulti-cloud-network-connect/manage/site_management/cloud_sites/aws_tgw_site
 - SITE_MANAGEMENT_AZURE_VNET_SITES: SITE_MANAGEMENT_AZURE_VNET_SITES

Site Management dashboard: /web/workspaces/multi-cloud-network-connect/manage/site_management/cloud_sites/azure_site
 - SITE_MANAGEMENT_GCP_VPC_SITES: SITE_MANAGEMENT_GCP_VPC_SITES

Site Management dashboard: /web/workspaces/multi-cloud-network-connect/manage/site_management/cloud_sites/gcp_vpc_site
 - SITE_MANAGEMENT_APP_STACK_SITES: SITE_MANAGEMENT_APP_STACK_SITES

Site Management dashboard: /web/workspaces/multi-cloud-network-connect/manage/site_management/cloud_sites/appstack_site
 - SITE_MANAGEMENT_SECURE_MESH_SITES: SITE_MANAGEMENT_SECURE_MESH_SITES

Site Management dashboard: /web/workspaces/multi-cloud-network-connect/manage/site_management/legacy_configs/securemesh_site
 - TENANT_OVERVIEW_PAGE: TENANT_OVERVIEW_PAGE

Tenant Overview Page: /web/workspaces/administration/tenant-settings/tenant-overview
 - SUPPORT: SUPPORT

Support Page: /web/home.
commonDashboardLinkType.title: LinkType

Value to be displayed as ICON

commonFilterOperator.description:
Operator for query filter

Specifies that query result includes filter values
 - NOT_IN: Filter Operator

Specifies that query result excludes filter values.

commonFormatType.description:
Format Type defines the format type for each fields.

No format
 - INLINE: Inline

Key value to be displayed in inline format
 - BOLD: Bold

Value to be displayed in bold format
 - REVERSE_KEY_VALUE_ORDER: ReverseKeyValueOrder

Key value to be displayed in Reverse Key Value Order format
 - WRAP: Wrap

Value to be wrapped.

policyIPThreatCategory.description:
The IP threat categories to use when a policy based IP threat category is configured.

 - SPAM_SOURCES: SPAM_SOURCES

 - WINDOWS_EXPLOITS: WINDOWS_EXPLOITS

 - WEB_ATTACKS: WEB_ATTACKS

 - BOTNETS: BOTNETS

 - SCANNERS: SCANNERS

 - REPUTATION: REPUTATION

 - PHISHING: PHISHING

 - PROXY: PROXY

 - MOBILE_THREATS: MOBILE_THREATS

 - TOR_PROXY: TOR_PROXY

 - DENIAL_OF_SERVICE: DENIAL_OF_SERVICE

 - NETWORK: NETWORK.
policyIPThreatCategory.title: IP Threat Category.

type_url.description:
A URL/resource name that uniquely identifies the type of the serialized
protocol buffer message. This string must contain at least
one "/" character. The last segment of the URL's path must represent
the fully qualified name of the type (as in
`path/google.protobuf.Duration`). The name should be in a canonical form
(e.g., leading "." is not accepted).

In practice, teams usually precompile into the binary all types that they
expect it to use in the context of Any. However, for URLs which use the
scheme `HTTP`, `HTTPS`, or no scheme, one can optionally set up a type
server that maps type URLs to message definitions as follows:

* If no scheme is provided, `HTTPS` is assumed.
* An HTTP GET on the URL must yield a [google.protobuf.Type][]
 value in binary format, or produce an error.
* Applications are allowed to cache lookup results based on the
 URL, or have them precompiled into a binary to avoid any
 lookup. Therefore, binary compatibility needs to be preserved
 on changes to types. (Use versioned type names to manage
 breaking changes.)

Note: this functionality is not currently available in the official
protobuf release, and it is not used for type URLs beginning with
type.googleapis.com.

Schemes other than `HTTP`, `HTTPS` (or the empty scheme) might be
used with implementation specific semantics.

value.description: Must be a valid serialized protocol buffer of the above specified type.

schemaEmpty.description: This can be used for messages where no values are needed.
schemaEmpty.title: Empty

schemaErrorCode.description:
Union of all possible error-codes from system

 - EOK: No error
 - EPERMS: Permissions error
 - EBADINPUT: Input is not correct
 - ENOTFOUND: Not found
 - EEXISTS: Already exists
 - EUNKNOWN: Unknown/catchall error
 - ESERIALIZE: Error in serializing/de-serializing
 - EINTERNAL: Server error
 - EPARTIAL: Partial error.
schemaErrorCode.title: ErrorCode

schemaErrorType.description: Information about a error in API operation.
schemaErrorType.title: ErrorType

message.description:
A human readable string of the error

Example: ` "value"`
message.title: Message
